  • Classes in org.dataconservancy.packaging.tool.ser used by org.dataconservancy.packaging.tool.ser 
    Class and Description
    AbstractPackageToolConverter
    Abstract XStream converter for Package Tool GUI serialization.
    JenaModelFactory
    Simple interface responsible for creating new instances of a Jena Model.
    XStreamMarshallerFactory
    Exposes configuration options that are not made available by the Spring XStreamMarshaller class.
    XStreamMarshallerFactory.LocalConverterHolder
    Encapsulates the properties of a "local" XStream converter: the Converter instance itself, the Class containing the field to be converted, and the name of the field to be converted.
